mapper.sql: a.mark_id, a.user_id, a.lat, a.lng, a.title, a.content, a.status, a.create_time, b.head_image, b.user_name as name
mapper.insert: insert into map_mark_message( user_id, lat, lng, title, content, status ) values ( #{userId}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{title}, #{content}, #{status} )
mapper.select: select a.mark_id as "markId", a.user_id as "userId", a.lat, a.lng, a.title, a.content, a.status from map_mark_message a where a.user_id=#{userId} and a.mark_id=#{markId} and status=#{status}
select a.mark_id as "markId", a.title, a.content, a.status from map_mark_message a where a.user_id=#{userId} and a.status!=#{status}
select from map_mark_message a left join sys_user b on a.user_id=b.user_id where a.mark_id=#{markId}
select a.user_id as "userId", a.mark_id as "markId", a.lng, a.lat, b.head_image as "headImage", b.name from map_mark_message a left join sys_user b on a.user_id=b.user_id

select
from map_mark_message a left join sys_user b on a.user_id=b.user_id where status=#{status} order by a.create_time desc
select from map_mark_message a left join sys_user b on a.user_id=b.user_id where a.user_id=#{userId}
select from map_mark_message a left join sys_user b on a.user_id=b.user_id where title like "%"#{title}"%"
